author: Paddy Whack
comment: It doesn't work on moto 360, and the permissions it needs are ones that an app that wanted to hijack your identity would use. Identity, Contacts, receive data from internet, full network access, use accounts on the device.   Remember the flashlight apps from China that sent user profiles back to China for God knows what. This app is worse then that.
title: Just no

author: Grahame Grice-Lowe
comment: It works my Moto 360 2nd gen but it can't be reversed without "force stop". This also cannot be reversed without uninstall - reinstall. Annoying!

author: Andreimoto Hanzo
comment: It works on moto360 with no problem
